   229‚Üí\```typescript
   230‚Üíimport { LaunchControlXL3 } from '@oletizi/launch-control-xl3';
   231‚Üíimport type { ControllerAdapterInterface } from '../../core/ControllerAdapter.js';
   232‚Üí
   233‚Üíexport class LaunchControlXL3Adapter implements ControllerAdapterInterface {
   234‚Üí  readonly manufacturer = 'Novation';
   235‚Üí  readonly model = 'Launch Control XL 3';
   236‚Üí  readonly capabilities = {
   237‚Üí    supportsCustomModes: true,
   238‚Üí    maxConfigSlots: 16,
   239‚Üí    supportsRead: true,
   240‚Üí    supportsWrite: true,
   241‚Üí    supportedControlTypes: ['encoder', 'slider', 'button'] as ControlType[]
   242‚Üí  };
   243‚Üí
   244‚Üí  constructor(private device: LaunchControlXL3) {}
   245‚Üí
   246‚Üí  static async create(): Promise<LaunchControlXL3Adapter> {
   247‚Üí    const device = new LaunchControlXL3({ enableCustomModes: true });
   248‚Üí    await device.connect();
   249‚Üí    return new LaunchControlXL3Adapter(device);
   250‚Üí  }
   251‚Üí
   252‚Üí  async connect(): Promise<void> {
   253‚Üí    await this.device.connect();
   254‚Üí  }
   255‚Üí
   256‚Üí  async disconnect(): Promise<void> {
   257‚Üí    await this.device.disconnect();
   258‚Üí  }
   259‚Üí
   260‚Üí  isConnected(): boolean {
   261‚Üí    return this.device.isConnected();
   262‚Üí  }
   263‚Üí
   264‚Üí  async listConfigurations(): Promise<ConfigurationSlot[]> {
   265‚Üí    const slots: ConfigurationSlot[] = [];
   266‚Üí    for (let i = 0; i < 16; i++) {
   267‚Üí      const mode = await this.device.readCustomMode(i);
   268‚Üí      slots.push({
   269‚Üí        index: i,
   270‚Üí        name: mode?.name,
   271‚Üí        isEmpty: mode === null
   272‚Üí      });
   273‚Üí    }
   274‚Üí    return slots;
   275‚Üí  }
   276‚Üí
   277‚Üí  async readConfiguration(slot: number): Promise<ControllerConfiguration> {
   278‚Üí    const customMode = await this.device.readCustomMode(slot);
   279‚Üí    if (!customMode) {
   280‚Üí      throw new Error(`No configuration in slot ${slot}`);
   281‚Üí    }
   282‚Üí
   283‚Üí    // Convert LCXL3 CustomMode ‚Üí generic ControllerConfiguration
   284‚Üí    return {
   285‚Üí      name: customMode.name,
   286‚Üí      controls: this.convertControls(customMode.controls),
   287‚Üí      metadata: customMode.metadata
   288‚Üí    };
   289‚Üí  }
   290‚Üí
   291‚Üí  async writeConfiguration(slot: number, config: ControllerConfiguration): Promise<void> {
   292‚Üí    // Convert generic ControllerConfiguration ‚Üí LCXL3 CustomMode
   293‚Üí    const customMode = this.convertToCustomMode(config);
   294‚Üí    await this.device.writeCustomMode(slot, customMode);
   295‚Üí  }
   296‚Üí
   297‚Üí  async getDeviceInfo(): Promise<DeviceInfo> {
   298‚Üí    const info = await this.device.verifyDevice();
   299‚Üí    return {
   300‚Üí      manufacturer: 'Novation',
   301‚Üí      model: 'Launch Control XL 3',
   302‚Üí      firmwareVersion: info.firmwareVersion
   303‚Üí    };
   304‚Üí  }
   305‚Üí
   306‚Üí  private convertControls(controls: any): ControlMapping[] {
   307‚Üí    const mappings: ControlMapping[] = [];
   308‚Üí    for (const [key, control] of Object.entries(controls)) {
   309‚Üí      mappings.push({
   310‚Üí        id: key,
   311‚Üí        name: (control as any).name,
   312‚Üí        type: (control as any).type,
   313‚Üí        cc: (control as any).ccNumber,
   314‚Üí        channel: (control as any).midiChannel,
   315‚Üí        range: [(control as any).minValue, (control as any).maxValue]
   316‚Üí      });
   317‚Üí    }
   318‚Üí    return mappings;
   319‚Üí  }

   342‚Üíexport class LaunchControlXL3Converter implements CanonicalConverterInterface {

   344‚Üí  getConverterInfo(): ConverterInfo {

   363‚Üí      version: '1.0.0',
   364‚Üí      device: {
   365‚Üí        manufacturer: 'Novation',
   366‚Üí        model: 'Launch Control XL 3',
   367‚Üí        ...(options.deviceOverrides || {})
   368‚Üí      },
   369‚Üí      metadata: {
   370‚Üí        name: config.name,
   371‚Üí        description: `Converted from LCXL3 custom mode: ${config.name}`,
   372‚Üí        date: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0],
   373‚Üí        tags: ['launch-control-xl3', 'auto-generated']
   374‚Üí      },
   375‚Üí      plugin: options.pluginInfo,
   376‚Üí      midi_channel: options.midiChannel,
   377‚Üí      controls: this.mapControls(config.controls, options)
   378‚Üí    };
   379‚Üí  }
   380‚Üí
   381‚Üí  private mapControls(controls: ControlMapping[], options: ConversionOptions): ControlDefinition[] {
   382‚Üí    return controls.map(control => ({
   383‚Üí      id: this.mapControlId(control.id),        // SEND_A1 ‚Üí encoder_1
   384‚Üí      name: options.preserveLabels ? control.name : this.getDefaultName(control.id),
   385‚Üí      type: this.mapControlType(control.type),
   386‚Üí      cc: control.cc!,
   387‚Üí      channel: control.channel ?? options.midiChannel ?? 0,
   388‚Üí      range: control.range || [0, 127],
   389‚Üí      description: `Mapped from ${control.id}`
   390‚Üí    }));
   391‚Üí  }
   392‚Üí
   393‚Üí  private mapControlId(lcxl3Id: string): string {
   394‚Üí    // LCXL3-specific mapping: SEND_A1 ‚Üí encoder_1, FADER1 ‚Üí slider_1, etc.
   395‚Üí    const mapping: Record<string, string> = {
   396‚Üí      'SEND_A1': 'encoder_1', 'SEND_A2': 'encoder_2', 'SEND_A3': 'encoder_3',
   397‚Üí      'SEND_A4': 'encoder_4', 'SEND_A5': 'encoder_5', 'SEND_A6': 'encoder_6',
   398‚Üí      'SEND_A7': 'encoder_7', 'SEND_A8': 'encoder_8',
   399‚Üí      'SEND_B1': 'encoder_9', 'SEND_B2': 'encoder_10', 'SEND_B3': 'encoder_11',
   400‚Üí      'SEND_B4': 'encoder_12', 'SEND_B5': 'encoder_13', 'SEND_B6': 'encoder_14',
   401‚Üí      'SEND_B7': 'encoder_15', 'SEND_B8': 'encoder_16',
   402‚Üí      'PAN1': 'encoder_17', 'PAN2': 'encoder_18', 'PAN3': 'encoder_19',
   403‚Üí      'PAN4': 'encoder_20', 'PAN5': 'encoder_21', 'PAN6': 'encoder_22',
   404‚Üí      'PAN7': 'encoder_23', 'PAN8': 'encoder_24',
   405‚Üí      'FADER1': 'slider_1', 'FADER2': 'slider_2', 'FADER3': 'slider_3',
   406‚Üí      'FADER4': 'slider_4', 'FADER5': 'slider_5', 'FADER6': 'slider_6',
   407‚Üí      'FADER7': 'slider_7', 'FADER8': 'slider_8',
   408‚Üí      'FOCUS1': 'button_1', 'FOCUS2': 'button_2', 'FOCUS3': 'button_3',
   409‚Üí      'FOCUS4': 'button_4', 'FOCUS5': 'button_5', 'FOCUS6': 'button_6',
   410‚Üí      'FOCUS7': 'button_7', 'FOCUS8': 'button_8',
   411‚Üí      'CONTROL1': 'button_9', 'CONTROL2': 'button_10', 'CONTROL3': 'button_11',
   412‚Üí      'CONTROL4': 'button_12', 'CONTROL5': 'button_13', 'CONTROL6': 'button_14',
   413‚Üí      'CONTROL7': 'button_15', 'CONTROL8': 'button_16'
   414‚Üí    };
   415‚Üí    return mapping[lcxl3Id] || lcxl3Id.toLowerCase();
   416‚Üí  }
   417‚Üí
   418‚Üí  private mapControlType(type: ControlType): 'encoder' | 'slider' | 'button' | 'button_group' {
   419‚Üí    return type;
   420‚Üí  }
   421‚Üí
   422‚Üí  private getDefaultName(controlId: string): string {
   423‚Üí    return controlId.replace(/_/g, ' ').replace(/\b\w/g, l => l.toUpperCase());
   424‚Üí  }
   425‚Üí}

   436‚Üí
   437‚Üí## Phase 4: Generalized Deployment Workflow
   438‚Üí
   439‚Üí**Location:** `modules/controller-workflow/src/orchestrator/DeploymentWorkflow.ts`
   440‚Üí
   441‚Üí\```typescript
   442‚Üíimport { EventEmitter } from 'eventemitter3';
   443‚Üí
   444‚Üíexport interface WorkflowOptions {
   445‚Üí  configSlot: number;
   446‚Üí  targets: string[];
   447‚Üí  pluginInfo?: PluginDefinition;
   448‚Üí  midiChannel?: number;
   449‚Üí  preserveLabels?: boolean;
   450‚Üí  outputDir?: string;
   451‚Üí  autoInstall?: boolean;
   452‚Üí  dryRun?: boolean;
   453‚Üí}
   454‚Üí
   455‚Üíexport interface WorkflowResult {
   456‚Üí  success: boolean;
   457‚Üí  controllerConfig?: ControllerConfiguration;
   458‚Üí  canonicalMap?: CanonicalMidiMap;
   459‚Üí  deployments: DeploymentResult[];
   460‚Üí  errors: string[];
   461‚Üí}
   462‚Üí
   463‚Üíexport interface CreateOptions {
   464‚Üí  controllerAdapter?: ControllerAdapterInterface;
   465‚Üí  targets: string[];
   466‚Üí}
   467‚Üí
   468‚Üíexport class DeploymentWorkflow extends EventEmitter {
   469‚Üí  constructor(
   470‚Üí    private controllerAdapter: ControllerAdapterInterface,
   471‚Üí    private converter: CanonicalConverterInterface,
   472‚Üí    private deployers: Map<string, DAWDeployerInterface>
   473‚Üí  ) {
   474‚Üí    super();
   475‚Üí  }
   476‚Üí
   477‚Üí  static async create(options: CreateOptions): Promise<DeploymentWorkflow> {
   478‚Üí    // Auto-detect controller or use specified adapter
   479‚Üí    const adapter = options.controllerAdapter || await this.detectController();
   480‚Üí
   481‚Üí    // Get appropriate converter for detected controller
   482‚Üí    const converter = this.getConverterFor(adapter);
   483‚Üí
   484‚Üí    // Initialize DAW deployers
   485‚Üí    const deployers = new Map<string, DAWDeployerInterface>();
   486‚Üí    if (options.targets.includes('ardour')) {
   487‚Üí      const { ArdourDeployer } = await import('../adapters/daws/ArdourDeployer.js');
   488‚Üí      deployers.set('ardour', new ArdourDeployer());
   489‚Üí    }
   490‚Üí    if (options.targets.includes('live')) {
   491‚Üí      const { LiveDeployer } = await import('../adapters/daws/LiveDeployer.js');
   492‚Üí      deployers.set('live', new LiveDeployer());
   493‚Üí    }
   494‚Üí
   495‚Üí    return new DeploymentWorkflow(adapter, converter, deployers);
   496‚Üí  }
   497‚Üí
   498‚Üí  async execute(options: WorkflowOptions): Promise<WorkflowResult> {
   499‚Üí    const errors: string[] = [];
   500‚Üí
   501‚Üí    try {
   502‚Üí      // Step 1: Read configuration from controller
   503‚Üí      this.emit('progress', { step: 1, message: 'Reading controller configuration...' });
   504‚Üí      const config = await this.controllerAdapter.readConfiguration(options.configSlot);
   505‚Üí
   506‚Üí      // Step 2: Convert to canonical format
   507‚Üí      this.emit('progress', { step: 2, message: 'Converting to canonical format...' });
   508‚Üí      const canonicalMap = this.converter.convert(config, {
   509‚Üí        pluginInfo: options.pluginInfo,
   510‚Üí        midiChannel: options.midiChannel,
   511‚Üí        preserveLabels: options.preserveLabels ?? true
   512‚Üí      });
   513‚Üí
   514‚Üí      // Step 3: Save canonical YAML (optional)
   515‚Üí      if (options.outputDir) {
   516‚Üí        await this.saveCanonical(canonicalMap, options.outputDir);
   517‚Üí      }
   518‚Üí
   519‚Üí      // Step 4: Deploy to each target DAW
   520‚Üí      this.emit('progress', { step: 3, message: 'Deploying to DAWs...' });
   521‚Üí      const deployments: DeploymentResult[] = [];
   522‚Üí
   523‚Üí      for (const target of options.targets) {
   524‚Üí        const deployer = this.deployers.get(target);
   525‚Üí        if (deployer) {
   526‚Üí          const result = await deployer.deploy(canonicalMap, {
   527‚Üí            autoInstall: options.autoInstall,
   528‚Üí            dryRun: options.dryRun
   529‚Üí          });
   530‚Üí          deployments.push(result);
   531‚Üí          if (!result.success) {
   532‚Üí            errors.push(...(result.errors || [`${target} deployment failed`]));
   533‚Üí          }
   534‚Üí        } else {
   535‚Üí          errors.push(`No deployer available for ${target}`);
   536‚Üí        }
   537‚Üí      }
   538‚Üí
   539‚Üí      return {
   540‚Üí        success: deployments.every(d => d.success) && errors.length === 0,
   541‚Üí        controllerConfig: config,
   542‚Üí        canonicalMap,
   543‚Üí        deployments,
   544‚Üí        errors
   545‚Üí      };
   546‚Üí
   547‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   548‚Üí      errors.push(error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error));
   549‚Üí      return {
   550‚Üí        success: false,
   551‚Üí        deployments: [],
   552‚Üí        errors
   553‚Üí      };
   554‚Üí    }
   555‚Üí  }
   556‚Üí
   557‚Üí  getControllerAdapter(): ControllerAdapterInterface {
   558‚Üí    return this.controllerAdapter;
   559‚Üí  }
   560‚Üí
   561‚Üí  private async saveCanonical(canonicalMap: CanonicalMidiMap, outputDir: string): Promise<void> {
   562‚Üí    const yaml = await import('yaml');
   563‚Üí    const { writeFileSync, mkdirSync } = await import('fs');
   564‚Üí    const { join } = await import('path');
   565‚Üí
   566‚Üí    mkdirSync(outputDir, { recursive: true });
   567‚Üí    const filename = `${canonicalMap.device.model.toLowerCase().replace(/\s+/g, '-')}-${canonicalMap.metadata.name.toLowerCase().replace(/\s+/g, '-')}.yaml`;
   568‚Üí    const filepath = join(outputDir, filename);
   569‚Üí
   570‚Üí    writeFileSync(filepath, yaml.stringify(canonicalMap));
   571‚Üí    this.emit('canonical-saved', { path: filepath });
   572‚Üí  }
   573‚Üí
   574‚Üí  private static async detectController(): Promise<ControllerAdapterInterface> {
   575‚Üí    // Try to detect connected controller
   576‚Üí    // Start with LCXL3, add more controllers later
   577‚Üí    try {
   578‚Üí      const { LaunchControlXL3Adapter } = await import('../adapters/controllers/LaunchControlXL3Adapter.js');
   579‚Üí      return await LaunchControlXL3Adapter.create();
   580‚Üí    } catch {
   581‚Üí      throw new Error('No supported controller detected');
   582‚Üí    }
   583‚Üí  }
   584‚Üí
   585‚Üí  private static getConverterFor(adapter: ControllerAdapterInterface): CanonicalConverterInterface {
   586‚Üí    // Registry of converters by controller model
   587‚Üí    if (adapter.model === 'Launch Control XL 3') {
   588‚Üí      const { LaunchControlXL3Converter } = require('../converters/LaunchControlXL3Converter.js');
   589‚Üí      return new LaunchControlXL3Converter();
   590‚Üí    }
   591‚Üí    throw new Error(`No converter available for ${adapter.model}`);
   592‚Üí  }
   593‚Üí}
   594‚Üí\```
   595‚Üí
   596‚Üí**Acceptance Criteria - Phase 4:**
   597‚Üí- ‚úÖ Works with any ControllerAdapterInterface
   598‚Üí- ‚úÖ Auto-detects connected controller
   599‚Üí- ‚úÖ Supports multiple DAW targets simultaneously
   600‚Üí- ‚úÖ Event-based progress reporting
   601‚Üí- ‚úÖ Comprehensive error handling

   609‚Üí\```typescript

   725‚Üí## Phase 6: DAW Deployers
   726‚Üí
   727‚Üí### Ardour Deployer
   728‚Üí
   729‚Üí**Location:** `modules/controller-workflow/src/adapters/daws/ArdourDeployer.ts`
   730‚Üí
   731‚Üí\```typescript
   732‚Üíimport { MidiMapBuilder, ArdourXMLSerializer } from '@oletizi/ardour-midi-maps';
   733‚Üí
   734‚Üíexport class ArdourDeployer implements DAWDeployerInterface {
   735‚Üí  readonly dawName = 'Ardour';
   736‚Üí  readonly version = '8.0';
   737‚Üí
   738‚Üí  async deploy(canonicalMap: CanonicalMidiMap, options: DeploymentOptions): Promise<DeploymentResult> {
   739‚Üí    try {
   740‚Üí      // Convert canonical ‚Üí Ardour XML
   741‚Üí      const ardourMap = this.convertToArdour(canonicalMap);
   742‚Üí      const serializer = new ArdourXMLSerializer();
   743‚Üí      const xml = serializer.serializeMidiMap(ardourMap);
   744‚Üí
   745‚Üí      // Determine output path
   746‚Üí      const outputPath = options.outputPath || await this.getDefaultOutputPath(canonicalMap);
   747‚Üí
   748‚Üí      if (!options.dryRun) {
   749‚Üí        const { writeFileSync, mkdirSync } = await import('fs');
   750‚Üí        const { dirname } = await import('path');
   751‚Üí
   752‚Üí        mkdirSync(dirname(outputPath), { recursive: true });
   753‚Üí        writeFileSync(outputPath, xml);
   754‚Üí
   755‚Üí        // Install to Ardour config if requested
   756‚Üí        if (options.autoInstall) {
   757‚Üí          const configDir = await this.getConfigDirectory();
   758‚Üí          const { basename, join } = await import('path');
   759‚Üí          const installPath = join(configDir, basename(outputPath));
   760‚Üí          writeFileSync(installPath, xml);
   761‚Üí          return {
   762‚Üí            success: true,
   763‚Üí            dawName: this.dawName,
   764‚Üí            outputPath: installPath,
   765‚Üí            installed: true
   766‚Üí          };
   767‚Üí        }
   768‚Üí      }
   769‚Üí
   770‚Üí      return {
   771‚Üí        success: true,
   772‚Üí        dawName: this.dawName,
   773‚Üí        outputPath,
   774‚Üí        installed: false
   775‚Üí      };
   776‚Üí
   777‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   778‚Üí      return {
   779‚Üí        success: false,
   780‚Üí        dawName: this.dawName,
   781‚Üí        errors: [error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error)]
   782‚Üí      };
   783‚Üí    }
   784‚Üí  }
   785‚Üí
   786‚Üí  async isInstalled(): Promise<boolean> {
   787‚Üí    const { existsSync } = await import('fs');
   788‚Üí    try {
   789‚Üí      const configDir = await this.getConfigDirectory();
   790‚Üí      return existsSync(configDir);
   791‚Üí    } catch {
   792‚Üí      return false;
   793‚Üí    }
   794‚Üí  }
   795‚Üí
   796‚Üí  async getConfigDirectory(): Promise<string> {
   797‚Üí    const { homedir } = await import('os');
   798‚Üí    const { join } = await import('path');
   799‚Üí    const home = homedir();
   800‚Üí
   801‚Üí    switch (process.platform) {
   802‚Üí      case 'darwin':
   803‚Üí        return join(home, 'Library', 'Preferences', 'Ardour8', 'midi_maps');
   804‚Üí      case 'linux':
   805‚Üí        return join(home, '.config', 'ardour8', 'midi_maps');
   806‚Üí      case 'win32':
   807‚Üí        return join(home, 'AppData', 'Local', 'Ardour8', 'midi_maps');
   808‚Üí      default:
   809‚Üí        throw new Error(`Unsupported platform: ${process.platform}`);
   810‚Üí    }
   811‚Üí  }
   812‚Üí
   813‚Üí  private convertToArdour(canonicalMap: CanonicalMidiMap): any {
   814‚Üí    // Use existing ardour-midi-maps conversion logic
   815‚Üí    const builder = new MidiMapBuilder({
   816‚Üí      name: `${canonicalMap.device.manufacturer} ${canonicalMap.device.model}`,
   817‚Üí      version: canonicalMap.version
   818‚Üí    });
   819‚Üí
   820‚Üí    // Convert controls
   821‚Üí    for (const control of canonicalMap.controls) {
   822‚Üí      if (control.type === 'button') {
   823‚Üí        builder.addNoteBinding({
   824‚Üí          channel: control.channel as number,
   825‚Üí          note: control.cc!,
   826‚Üí          function: control.plugin_parameter ?
   827‚Üí            `/route/plugin/parameter S1 1 ${control.plugin_parameter}` :
   828‚Üí            'transport-stop'
   829‚Üí        });
   830‚Üí      } else {
   831‚Üí        builder.addCCBinding({
   832‚Üí          channel: control.channel as number,
   833‚Üí          controller: control.cc!,
   834‚Üí          function: control.plugin_parameter ?
   835‚Üí            `/route/plugin/parameter S1 1 ${control.plugin_parameter}` :
   836‚Üí            'track-set-gain[1]',
   837‚Üí          encoder: control.type === 'encoder'
   838‚Üí        });
   839‚Üí      }
   840‚Üí    }
   841‚Üí
   842‚Üí    return builder.build();
   843‚Üí  }
   844‚Üí
   845‚Üí  private async getDefaultOutputPath(canonicalMap: CanonicalMidiMap): Promise<string> {
   846‚Üí    const { join } = await import('path');
   847‚Üí    const filename = `${canonicalMap.device.manufacturer.toLowerCase()}-${canonicalMap.device.model.toLowerCase().replace(/\s+/g, '-')}.map`;
   848‚Üí    return join(process.cwd(), 'dist', 'ardour-maps', filename);
   849‚Üí  }
   850‚Üí}
   851‚Üí\```

   175‚ÜíConsider:

   177‚Üí- Common abbreviations (e.g., "Res" for "Resonance", "Env" for "Envelope")

   230‚Üí  private async callClaude(prompt: string): Promise<string> {

   240‚Üí  /**

   243‚Üí   * Makes a direct HTTP request to the Anthropic API endpoint.

   250‚Üí  private async callClaudeAPI(prompt: string, apiKey: string): Promise<string> {
   251‚Üí    const response = await fetch('https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages', {
   252‚Üí      method: 'POST',
   253‚Üí      headers: {
   254‚Üí        'Content-Type': 'application/json',
   255‚Üí        'x-api-key': apiKey,

   263‚Üí            role: 'user',

   269‚Üí
   270‚Üí    if (!response.ok) {
   271‚Üí      const error = await response.text();
   272‚Üí      throw new Error(`Claude API request failed: ${response.status} - ${error}`);
   273‚Üí    }
   274‚Üí
   275‚Üí    const data = (await response.json()) as {
   276‚Üí      content: Array<{ type: string; text: string }>;
   277‚Üí    };
   278‚Üí
   279‚Üí    if (!data.content || data.content.length === 0) {
   280‚Üí      throw new Error('Claude API returned empty response');
   281‚Üí    }
   282‚Üí
   283‚Üí    const firstContent = data.content[0];
   284‚Üí    if (!firstContent) {
   285‚Üí      throw new Error('Claude API returned empty content array');
   286‚Üí    }
   287‚Üí
   288‚Üí    return firstContent.text;
   289‚Üí  }

   291‚Üí  /**

   296‚Üí   * @param prompt - The matching prompt

   300‚Üí  private async callClaudeCLI(prompt: string): Promise<string> {
   301‚Üí    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {

   304‚Üí      });
   305‚Üí
   306‚Üí      let stdout = '';
   307‚Üí      let stderr = '';
   308‚Üí
   309‚Üí      const timeoutHandle = setTimeout(() => {
   310‚Üí        process.kill();
   311‚Üí        reject(new Error(`Claude CLI request timed out after ${this.timeout}ms`));
   312‚Üí      }, this.timeout);
   313‚Üí
   314‚Üí      process.stdout.on('data', (data) => {
   315‚Üí        stdout += data.toString();
   316‚Üí      });
   317‚Üí
   318‚Üí      process.stderr.on('data', (data) => {
   319‚Üí        stderr += data.toString();
   320‚Üí      });
   321‚Üí
   322‚Üí      process.on('error', (error) => {
   323‚Üí        clearTimeout(timeoutHandle);
   324‚Üí        reject(new Error(`Failed to spawn Claude CLI: ${error.message}`));
   325‚Üí      });
   326‚Üí
   327‚Üí      process.on('close', (code) => {
   328‚Üí        clearTimeout(timeoutHandle);
   329‚Üí
   330‚Üí        if (code !== 0) {
   331‚Üí          reject(new Error(`Claude CLI exited with code ${code}: ${stderr}`));
   332‚Üí          return;
   333‚Üí        }
   334‚Üí
   335‚Üí        if (!stdout.trim()) {
   336‚Üí          reject(new Error('Claude CLI returned empty response'));
   337‚Üí          return;
   338‚Üí        }
   339‚Üí
   340‚Üí        resolve(stdout);
   341‚Üí      });
   342‚Üí
   343‚Üí      // Write prompt to stdin
   344‚Üí      process.stdin.write(prompt);
   345‚Üí      process.stdin.end();
   346‚Üí    });
   347‚Üí  }

 * Each controller type implements this interface to provide a uniform API.

/**
 * Core interface for controller interrogation and configuration management.
 * Implementations wrap controller-specific libraries to provide a uniform API.
 */
export interface ControllerAdapterInterface {
  /** Controller metadata */
  readonly manufacturer: string;
  readonly model: string;
  readonly capabilities: ControllerCapabilities;

  /** Connection management */
  connect(): Promise<void>;
  disconnect(): Promise<void>;
  isConnected(): boolean;

  /** Configuration retrieval */
  listConfigurations(): Promise<ConfigurationSlot[]>;
  readConfiguration(slot: number): Promise<ControllerConfiguration>;
  writeConfiguration?(slot: number, config: ControllerConfiguration): Promise<void>;

  /** Device information */
  getDeviceInfo(): Promise<DeviceInfo>;
}

/**
 * Defines the capabilities of a MIDI controller.
 */
export interface ControllerCapabilities {
  /** Whether the controller supports custom mode programming */
  supportsCustomModes: boolean;
  /** Maximum number of configuration slots available */
  maxConfigSlots: number;
  /** Whether configurations can be read from the device */
  supportsRead: boolean;
  /** Whether configurations can be written to the device */
  supportsWrite: boolean;
  /** Types of controls supported by this controller */
  supportedControlTypes: ControlType[];
}

/**
 * Generic controller configuration format.
 * Controller-specific formats are converted to/from this representation.
 */
export interface ControllerConfiguration {
  /** Human-readable configuration name */
  name: string;
  /** List of control mappings */
  controls: ControlMapping[];
  /** Additional controller-specific metadata */
  metadata?: Record<string, unknown>;
}

/**
 * Represents a configuration slot on the controller.
 */
export interface ConfigurationSlot {
  /** Zero-based slot index */
  index: number;
  /** Optional user-defined slot name */
  name?: string;
  /** Whether this slot contains a configuration */
  isEmpty: boolean;
}

/**
 * Represents a single control mapping within a controller configuration.
 */
export interface ControlMapping {
  /** Unique identifier for this control (e.g., "SEND_A1", "FADER1") */
  id: string;
  /** Optional human-readable control name */
  name?: string;
  /** Type of control */
  type: ControlType;
  /** MIDI CC number for this control */
  cc?: number;
  /** MIDI channel (0-15) */
  channel?: number;
  /** Value range [min, max] */
  range?: [number, number];
  /** AI-matched plugin parameter index (optional, populated by ParameterMatcher) */
  plugin_parameter?: number;
}

/**
 * Types of MIDI controls supported.
 */
export type ControlType = 'encoder' | 'slider' | 'button' | 'button_group';

/**
 * Device information retrieved from the controller.
 */
export interface DeviceInfo {
  /** Device manufacturer name */
  manufacturer: string;
  /** Device model name */
  model: string;
  /** Optional firmware version string */
  firmwareVersion?: string;
}

/**

 * @throws Error if slot number is invalid (not 0-15)

async function executeDeployment(options: {

  await controller.connect();

  const deviceInfo = await controller.getDeviceInfo();
  const config = await controller.readConfiguration(slotNumber);

  console.log(`     ‚úì Controller: ${deviceInfo.manufacturer} ${deviceInfo.model}`);
  console.log(`     ‚úì Configuration: "${config.name}" from slot ${slotNumber}\n`);

  // Step 1.5: AI-powered parameter matching (if plugin specified)
  if (options.plugin) {
    try {
      emitProgress({ step: 1.5, total: 3, message: 'AI-matching control names to plugin parameters...' });

      const { ParameterMatcher, loadPluginDescriptor } = await import('../services/ParameterMatcher.js');

      // Load plugin descriptor
      const descriptor = await loadPluginDescriptor(options.plugin);
      console.log(`     ‚úì Loaded plugin descriptor: ${descriptor.plugin.name} (${descriptor.parameters.length} parameters)`);

      // Extract control names
      const controlNames = config.controls
        .filter(c => c.name && c.name.trim().length > 0)
        .map(c => c.name!);

      if (controlNames.length === 0) {
        console.log('     ‚ö† No named controls found, skipping AI matching');
      } else {
        // Match parameters
        const matcher = ParameterMatcher.create({ minConfidence: 0.6 });
        const matches = await matcher.matchParameters(controlNames, descriptor);

        // Add plugin_parameter to controls
        let matchCount = 0;
        config.controls.forEach((control) => {
          if (!control.name) return;

          const match = matches.find(m => m.controlName === control.name);
          if (match?.pluginParameter !== undefined) {
            control.plugin_parameter = match.pluginParameter;
            matchCount++;
          }
        });

        console.log(`     ‚úì AI-matched ${matchCount}/${controlNames.length} controls (${((matchCount/controlNames.length)*100).toFixed(0)}%)`);

        // Show low confidence warnings
        const lowConfidence = matches.filter(m => m.confidence < 0.7 && m.pluginParameter !== undefined);
        if (lowConfidence.length > 0) {
          console.log(`     ‚ö† ${lowConfidence.length} matches with confidence < 0.7:`);
          lowConfidence.forEach(m => {
            console.log(`       - "${m.controlName}" ‚Üí ${m.parameterName} (${(m.confidence * 100).toFixed(0)}%)`);
          });
        }
      }
    } catch (error: unknown) {
      const errorMessage = error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error);
      console.log(`     ‚ö† AI matching failed: ${errorMessage}`);
      console.log('     ‚Ñπ Continuing without parameter matching...');
      // Don't fail deployment if AI matching fails
    }
    console.log('');
  }

  // Step 2: Convert to canonical format
  emitProgress({ step: 2, total: 3, message: 'Converting to canonical format...' });

  const converter = new LaunchControlXL3Converter();

  // Build plugin info if provided
  let pluginInfo: PluginDefinition | undefined;
  if (options.plugin) {
    pluginInfo = {
      manufacturer: 'Unknown',
      name: options.plugin,
    };
  }

  const canonicalMap: CanonicalMidiMap = converter.convert(config, {
    ...(pluginInfo ? { pluginInfo } : {}),
    ...(midiChannel !== undefined ? { midiChannel } : {}),
    preserveLabels: true,
  });

  // Write canonical YAML
  let canonicalPath = '';
  if (!options.dryRun) {
    await fs.mkdir(options.output, { recursive: true });
    const canonicalFilename = `${sanitizeFilename(config.name)}.yaml`;
    canonicalPath = path.join(options.output, canonicalFilename);

    const yamlContent = yamlStringify(canonicalMap);
    await fs.writeFile(canonicalPath, yamlContent, 'utf-8');

    console.log(`     ‚úì Saved canonical: ${canonicalPath}\n`);
  } else {
    canonicalPath = path.join(options.output, `${sanitizeFilename(config.name)}.yaml`);
    console.log(`     ‚úì Canonical format generated (dry-run - not saved)\n`);
  }

  // Step 3: Deploy to DAWs
  emitProgress({ step: 3, total: 3, message: 'Deploying to DAWs...' });

  const dawPaths: Record<string, string> = {};
  const errors: string[] = [];

  for (const daw of options.daw) {
    try {
      const deployer = createDeployer(daw);
      const dawPath = await deployer.deploy(canonicalMap, {
        autoInstall: options.install,
        outputPath: path.join(options.output, `${sanitizeFilename(config.name)}.${getFileExtension(daw)}`),
        dryRun: options.dryRun,
      });

      if (dawPath.success && dawPath.outputPath) {
        dawPaths[daw] = dawPath.outputPath;
        console.log(`     ‚úì ${capitalize(daw)}: ${dawPath.outputPath}`);
      } else {
        const deployErrors = dawPath.errors?.join(', ') || 'Unknown error';
        errors.push(`${daw}: ${deployErrors}`);
        console.log(`     ‚úó ${capitalize(daw)}: ${deployErrors}`);
      }
    } catch (error: unknown) {
      const errorMessage = error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error);
      errors.push(`${daw}: ${errorMessage}`);
      console.log(`     ‚úó ${capitalize(daw)}: ${errorMessage}`);
    }
  }

  await controller.disconnect();

  return {
    success: errors.length === 0,
    controller: `${deviceInfo.manufacturer} ${deviceInfo.model}`,
    slot: slotNumber,
    canonicalPath,
    dawPaths,
    errors,
  };
}

/**
 * Create DAW deployer based on DAW type.
 *
 * Factory function that instantiates the appropriate deployer implementation
 * for the specified DAW.
 *
 * @param daw - DAW name (e.g., "ardour", "live", "ableton")
 * @returns DAW-specific deployer instance
 * @throws Error if DAW is not supported
 */
function createDeployer(daw: string): DAWDeployerInterface {
  const normalizedDAW = daw.toLowerCase();

  switch (normalizedDAW) {
    case 'ardour':
      return ArdourDeployer.create();

    case 'live':
    case 'ableton':
      throw new Error('Ableton Live deployment not yet implemented');

    default:
      throw new Error(`Unsupported DAW: ${daw}`);
  }
}

/**
 * Get file extension for DAW format.
 *
 * Maps DAW names to their respective output file extensions.
 *
 * @param daw - DAW name (e.g., "ardour", "live")
 * @returns File extension without dot (e.g., "map", "amxd")
 */
function getFileExtension(daw: string): string {
  const normalizedDAW = daw.toLowerCase();

  switch (normalizedDAW) {
    case 'ardour':
      return 'map';
    case 'live':
    case 'ableton':
      return 'amxd';
    default:
      return 'txt';
  }
}

/**
 * Auto-detect connected MIDI controller.
 *
 * Attempts to detect and connect to a supported MIDI controller.
 * Currently supports Novation Launch Control XL 3, with future
 * extensibility for additional controllers.
 *
 * @returns Connected controller adapter instance
 * @throws Error if no supported controller is detected
 */
async function detectController(): Promise<ControllerAdapterInterface> {
  // Attempt to detect LCXL3
  try {
    const adapter = await LaunchControlXL3Adapter.create();
    return adapter;
  } catch (error: unknown) {
    throw new Error(
      'No supported controller detected. Ensure your controller is connected via USB.\n' +
      'Supported controllers: Novation Launch Control XL 3'
    );
  }
}

/**
 * Emit progress message to console.
 *
 * Displays a formatted progress message showing the current step
 * in the deployment workflow.
 *
 * @param event - Progress event containing step, total, and message
 */
function emitProgress(event: ProgressEvent): void {
  console.log(`[${event.step}/${event.total}] ${event.message}`);
}

/**
 * Display successful deployment summary.
 *
 * Prints a formatted success message with paths to all generated files
 * including the canonical YAML and DAW-specific formats.
 *
 * @param result - Deployment result summary
 */
function displaySuccessSummary(result: DeploymentSummary): void {
  console.log('\n‚úÖ Deployment complete!\n');

  console.log(`  Canonical YAML: ${result.canonicalPath}`);

  if (Object.keys(result.dawPaths).length > 0) {
    console.log('\n  DAW Formats:');
    for (const [daw, dawPath] of Object.entries(result.dawPaths)) {
      console.log(`    ${capitalize(daw)}: ${dawPath}`);
    }
  }

  console.log('');
}

/**
 * Display error summary.
 *
 * Prints a formatted error message listing all errors that occurred
 * during the deployment workflow.
 *
 * @param result - Deployment result summary with errors
 */
function displayErrorSummary(result: DeploymentSummary): void {
  console.error('\n‚ùå Deployment failed\n');

  if (result.errors.length > 0) {
    console.error('  Errors:');
    for (const error of result.errors) {
      console.error(`    - ${error}`);
    }
    console.error('');
  }
}

/**
 * Handle uncaught errors.
 *
 * Final error handler that prints error messages and exits the process
 * with a non-zero status code.
 *
 * @param error - Error object or string
 */
function handleError(error: unknown): void {
  const message = error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error);
  console.error(`\n‚ùå Error: ${message}\n`);
  process.exit(1);
}

/**
 * Sanitize filename for filesystem safety.
 *
 * Removes special characters and normalizes spaces to underscores
 * to create safe filenames for all platforms.
 *
 * @param name - Original name string
 * @returns Sanitized filename safe for filesystem use
 *
 * @example
 * \```typescript
 * sanitizeFilename("My Config #1")  // returns "my_config_1"
 * sanitizeFilename("Test-Mode")     // returns "test-mode"
 * \```
 */
function sanitizeFilename(name: string): string {
  return name
    .replace(/[^a-z0-9_-]/gi, '_')
    .replace(/_+/g, '_')
    .toLowerCase();
}

/**
 * Capitalize first letter of string.
 *
 * Simple utility to capitalize the first character of a string
 * for display purposes.
 *
 * @param str - Input string
 * @returns String with first character capitalized
 *
 * @example
 * \```typescript
 * capitalize("ardour")  // returns "Ardour"
 * capitalize("live")    // returns "Live"
 * \```
 */
function capitalize(str: string): string {
  return str.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + str.slice(1);
}

  if (options.plugin) {
    try {
      emitProgress({ step: 1.5, total: 3, message: 'AI-matching control names to plugin parameters...' });

      const { ParameterMatcher, loadPluginDescriptor } = await import('../services/ParameterMatcher.js');

      // Load plugin descriptor
      const descriptor = await loadPluginDescriptor(options.plugin);
      console.log(`     ‚úì Loaded plugin descriptor: ${descriptor.plugin.name} (${descriptor.parameters.length} parameters)`);

      // Extract control names
      const controlNames = config.controls
        .filter(c => c.name && c.name.trim().length > 0)
        .map(c => c.name!);

      if (controlNames.length === 0) {
        console.log('     ‚ö† No named controls found, skipping AI matching');
      } else {
        // Match parameters
        const matcher = ParameterMatcher.create({ minConfidence: 0.6 });
        const matches = await matcher.matchParameters(controlNames, descriptor);

        // Add plugin_parameter to controls
        let matchCount = 0;
        config.controls.forEach((control) => {
          if (!control.name) return;

          const match = matches.find(m => m.controlName === control.name);
          if (match?.pluginParameter !== undefined) {
            control.plugin_parameter = match.pluginParameter;
            matchCount++;
          }
        });

        console.log(`     ‚úì AI-matched ${matchCount}/${controlNames.length} controls (${((matchCount/controlNames.length)*100).toFixed(0)}%)`);

        // Show low confidence warnings
        const lowConfidence = matches.filter(m => m.confidence < 0.7 && m.pluginParameter !== undefined);
        if (lowConfidence.length > 0) {
          console.log(`     ‚ö† ${lowConfidence.length} matches with confidence < 0.7:`);
          lowConfidence.forEach(m => {
            console.log(`       - "${m.controlName}" ‚Üí ${m.parameterName} (${(m.confidence * 100).toFixed(0)}%)`);
          });
        }
      }
    } catch (error: unknown) {
      const errorMessage = error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error);
      console.log(`     ‚ö† AI matching failed: ${errorMessage}`);
      console.log('     ‚Ñπ Continuing without parameter matching...');
      // Don't fail deployment if AI matching fails
    }
    console.log('');
  }

**Issue:** #360

## Phase 1: Core Abstraction Layer

### 1.1 Controller Adapter Interface

**Location:** `modules/controller-workflow/src/core/ControllerAdapter.ts`

\```typescript
/**
 * Abstract interface for controller interrogation
 * Each controller type implements this interface
 */
export interface ControllerAdapterInterface {
  /** Controller metadata */
  readonly manufacturer: string;
  readonly model: string;
  readonly capabilities: ControllerCapabilities;

  /** Connection management */
  connect(): Promise<void>;
  disconnect(): Promise<void>;
  isConnected(): boolean;

  /** Configuration retrieval */
  listConfigurations(): Promise<ConfigurationSlot[]>;
  readConfiguration(slot: number): Promise<ControllerConfiguration>;
  writeConfiguration?(slot: number, config: ControllerConfiguration): Promise<void>;

  /** Device information */
  getDeviceInfo(): Promise<DeviceInfo>;
}

export interface ControllerCapabilities {
  supportsCustomModes: boolean;
  maxConfigSlots: number;
  supportsRead: boolean;
  supportsWrite: boolean;
  supportedControlTypes: ControlType[];
}

export interface ControllerConfiguration {
  name: string;
  controls: ControlMapping[];
  metadata?: Record<string, any>;
}

export interface ConfigurationSlot {
  index: number;
  name?: string;
  isEmpty: boolean;
}

export interface ControlMapping {
  id: string;
  name?: string;
  type: ControlType;
  cc?: number;
  channel?: number;
  range?: [number, number];
}

export type ControlType = 'encoder' | 'slider' | 'button' | 'button_group';

export interface DeviceInfo {
  manufacturer: string;
  model: string;
  firmwareVersion?: string;
}
\```

/**
 * Abstract interface for converting controller configs ‚Üí canonical format

 */
export interface CanonicalConverterInterface {
  /** Convert controller-specific config to canonical map */
  convert(
    config: ControllerConfiguration,
    options: ConversionOptions
  ): CanonicalMidiMap;

  /** Validate conversion is possible */
  canConvert(config: ControllerConfiguration): boolean;

  /** Get converter metadata */

}

export interface ConversionOptions {
  pluginInfo?: PluginDefinition;
  midiChannel?: number;
  preserveLabels?: boolean;
  deviceOverrides?: Partial<DeviceDefinition>;
}

  version: string;
  features: string[];
}

## Phase 2: Launch Control XL3 Adapter (Reference Implementation)

**Location:** `modules/controller-workflow/src/adapters/controllers/LaunchControlXL3Adapter.ts`

\```typescript
import { LaunchControlXL3 } from '@oletizi/launch-control-xl3';
import type { ControllerAdapterInterface } from '../../core/ControllerAdapter.js';

export class LaunchControlXL3Adapter implements ControllerAdapterInterface {
  readonly manufacturer = 'Novation';
  readonly model = 'Launch Control XL 3';
  readonly capabilities = {
    supportsCustomModes: true,
    maxConfigSlots: 16,
    supportsRead: true,
    supportsWrite: true,
    supportedControlTypes: ['encoder', 'slider', 'button'] as ControlType[]
  };

  constructor(private device: LaunchControlXL3) {}

  static async create(): Promise<LaunchControlXL3Adapter> {
    const device = new LaunchControlXL3({ enableCustomModes: true });
    await device.connect();
    return new LaunchControlXL3Adapter(device);
  }

  async connect(): Promise<void> {
    await this.device.connect();
  }

  async disconnect(): Promise<void> {
    await this.device.disconnect();
  }

  isConnected(): boolean {
    return this.device.isConnected();
  }

  async listConfigurations(): Promise<ConfigurationSlot[]> {
    const slots: ConfigurationSlot[] = [];
    for (let i = 0; i < 16; i++) {
      const mode = await this.device.readCustomMode(i);
      slots.push({
        index: i,
        name: mode?.name,
        isEmpty: mode === null
      });
    }
    return slots;
  }

  async readConfiguration(slot: number): Promise<ControllerConfiguration> {
    const customMode = await this.device.readCustomMode(slot);
    if (!customMode) {
      throw new Error(`No configuration in slot ${slot}`);
    }

    // Convert LCXL3 CustomMode ‚Üí generic ControllerConfiguration
    return {
      name: customMode.name,
      controls: this.convertControls(customMode.controls),
      metadata: customMode.metadata
    };
  }

  async writeConfiguration(slot: number, config: ControllerConfiguration): Promise<void> {
    // Convert generic ControllerConfiguration ‚Üí LCXL3 CustomMode
    const customMode = this.convertToCustomMode(config);
    await this.device.writeCustomMode(slot, customMode);
  }

  async getDeviceInfo(): Promise<DeviceInfo> {
    const info = await this.device.verifyDevice();
    return {
      manufacturer: 'Novation',
      model: 'Launch Control XL 3',
      firmwareVersion: info.firmwareVersion
    };
  }

  private convertControls(controls: any): ControlMapping[] {
    const mappings: ControlMapping[] = [];
    for (const [key, control] of Object.entries(controls)) {
      mappings.push({
        id: key,
        name: (control as any).name,
        type: (control as any).type,
        cc: (control as any).ccNumber,
        channel: (control as any).midiChannel,
        range: [(control as any).minValue, (control as any).maxValue]
      });
    }
    return mappings;
  }

  private convertToCustomMode(config: ControllerConfiguration): any {
    // Implementation details
    throw new Error('Not yet implemented');
  }
}
\```

## Phase 3: Launch Control XL3 Converter

**Location:** `modules/controller-workflow/src/converters/LaunchControlXL3Converter.ts`

\```typescript
export class LaunchControlXL3Converter implements CanonicalConverterInterface {

  getConverterInfo(): ConverterInfo {
    return {
      supportedController: 'Novation Launch Control XL 3',
      version: '1.0.0',
      features: ['custom-modes', 'label-preservation', 'all-control-types']
    };
  }

  canConvert(config: ControllerConfiguration): boolean {
    // Validate config has required LCXL3 structure
    return config.controls.length > 0 &&
           config.controls.every(c => c.cc !== undefined);
  }

  convert(
    config: ControllerConfiguration,
    options: ConversionOptions
  ): CanonicalMidiMap {
    return {
      version: '1.0.0',
      device: {
        manufacturer: 'Novation',
        model: 'Launch Control XL 3',
        ...(options.deviceOverrides || {})
      },
      metadata: {
        name: config.name,
        description: `Converted from LCXL3 custom mode: ${config.name}`,
        date: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0],
        tags: ['launch-control-xl3', 'auto-generated']
      },
      plugin: options.pluginInfo,
      midi_channel: options.midiChannel,
      controls: this.mapControls(config.controls, options)
    };
  }

  private mapControls(controls: ControlMapping[], options: ConversionOptions): ControlDefinition[] {
    return controls.map(control => ({
      id: this.mapControlId(control.id),        // SEND_A1 ‚Üí encoder_1
      name: options.preserveLabels ? control.name : this.getDefaultName(control.id),
      type: this.mapControlType(control.type),
      cc: control.cc!,
      channel: control.channel ?? options.midiChannel ?? 0,
      range: control.range || [0, 127],
      description: `Mapped from ${control.id}`
    }));
  }

  private mapControlId(lcxl3Id: string): string {
    // LCXL3-specific mapping: SEND_A1 ‚Üí encoder_1, FADER1 ‚Üí slider_1, etc.
    const mapping: Record<string, string> = {
      'SEND_A1': 'encoder_1', 'SEND_A2': 'encoder_2', 'SEND_A3': 'encoder_3',
      'SEND_A4': 'encoder_4', 'SEND_A5': 'encoder_5', 'SEND_A6': 'encoder_6',
      'SEND_A7': 'encoder_7', 'SEND_A8': 'encoder_8',
      'SEND_B1': 'encoder_9', 'SEND_B2': 'encoder_10', 'SEND_B3': 'encoder_11',
      'SEND_B4': 'encoder_12', 'SEND_B5': 'encoder_13', 'SEND_B6': 'encoder_14',
      'SEND_B7': 'encoder_15', 'SEND_B8': 'encoder_16',
      'PAN1': 'encoder_17', 'PAN2': 'encoder_18', 'PAN3': 'encoder_19',
      'PAN4': 'encoder_20', 'PAN5': 'encoder_21', 'PAN6': 'encoder_22',
      'PAN7': 'encoder_23', 'PAN8': 'encoder_24',
      'FADER1': 'slider_1', 'FADER2': 'slider_2', 'FADER3': 'slider_3',
      'FADER4': 'slider_4', 'FADER5': 'slider_5', 'FADER6': 'slider_6',
      'FADER7': 'slider_7', 'FADER8': 'slider_8',
      'FOCUS1': 'button_1', 'FOCUS2': 'button_2', 'FOCUS3': 'button_3',
      'FOCUS4': 'button_4', 'FOCUS5': 'button_5', 'FOCUS6': 'button_6',
      'FOCUS7': 'button_7', 'FOCUS8': 'button_8',
      'CONTROL1': 'button_9', 'CONTROL2': 'button_10', 'CONTROL3': 'button_11',
      'CONTROL4': 'button_12', 'CONTROL5': 'button_13', 'CONTROL6': 'button_14',
      'CONTROL7': 'button_15', 'CONTROL8': 'button_16'
    };
    return mapping[lcxl3Id] || lcxl3Id.toLowerCase();
  }

  private mapControlType(type: ControlType): 'encoder' | 'slider' | 'button' | 'button_group' {
    return type;
  }

  private getDefaultName(controlId: string): string {
    return controlId.replace(/_/g, ' ').replace(/\b\w/g, l => l.toUpperCase());
  }
}
\```

## Phase 4: Generalized Deployment Workflow

**Location:** `modules/controller-workflow/src/orchestrator/DeploymentWorkflow.ts`

\```typescript
import { EventEmitter } from 'eventemitter3';

export interface WorkflowOptions {
  configSlot: number;
  targets: string[];
  pluginInfo?: PluginDefinition;
  midiChannel?: number;
  preserveLabels?: boolean;
  outputDir?: string;
  autoInstall?: boolean;
  dryRun?: boolean;
}

export interface WorkflowResult {
  success: boolean;
  controllerConfig?: ControllerConfiguration;
  canonicalMap?: CanonicalMidiMap;
  deployments: DeploymentResult[];
  errors: string[];
}

export interface CreateOptions {
  controllerAdapter?: ControllerAdapterInterface;
  targets: string[];
}

export class DeploymentWorkflow extends EventEmitter {
  constructor(
    private controllerAdapter: ControllerAdapterInterface,
    private converter: CanonicalConverterInterface,
    private deployers: Map<string, DAWDeployerInterface>
  ) {
    super();
  }

  static async create(options: CreateOptions): Promise<DeploymentWorkflow> {
    // Auto-detect controller or use specified adapter
    const adapter = options.controllerAdapter || await this.detectController();

    // Get appropriate converter for detected controller
    const converter = this.getConverterFor(adapter);

    // Initialize DAW deployers
    const deployers = new Map<string, DAWDeployerInterface>();
    if (options.targets.includes('ardour')) {
      const { ArdourDeployer } = await import('../adapters/daws/ArdourDeployer.js');
      deployers.set('ardour', new ArdourDeployer());
    }
    if (options.targets.includes('live')) {
      const { LiveDeployer } = await import('../adapters/daws/LiveDeployer.js');
      deployers.set('live', new LiveDeployer());
    }

    return new DeploymentWorkflow(adapter, converter, deployers);
  }

  async execute(options: WorkflowOptions): Promise<WorkflowResult> {
    const errors: string[] = [];

    try {
      // Step 1: Read configuration from controller
      this.emit('progress', { step: 1, message: 'Reading controller configuration...' });
      const config = await this.controllerAdapter.readConfiguration(options.configSlot);

      // Step 2: Convert to canonical format
      this.emit('progress', { step: 2, message: 'Converting to canonical format...' });
      const canonicalMap = this.converter.convert(config, {
        pluginInfo: options.pluginInfo,
        midiChannel: options.midiChannel,
        preserveLabels: options.preserveLabels ?? true
      });

      // Step 3: Save canonical YAML (optional)
      if (options.outputDir) {
        await this.saveCanonical(canonicalMap, options.outputDir);
      }

      // Step 4: Deploy to each target DAW
      this.emit('progress', { step: 3, message: 'Deploying to DAWs...' });
      const deployments: DeploymentResult[] = [];

      for (const target of options.targets) {
        const deployer = this.deployers.get(target);
        if (deployer) {
          const result = await deployer.deploy(canonicalMap, {
            autoInstall: options.autoInstall,
            dryRun: options.dryRun
          });
          deployments.push(result);
          if (!result.success) {
            errors.push(...(result.errors || [`${target} deployment failed`]));
          }
        } else {
          errors.push(`No deployer available for ${target}`);
        }
      }

      return {
        success: deployments.every(d => d.success) && errors.length === 0,
        controllerConfig: config,
        canonicalMap,
        deployments,
        errors
      };

    } catch (error) {
      errors.push(error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error));
      return {
        success: false,
        deployments: [],
        errors
      };
    }
  }

  getControllerAdapter(): ControllerAdapterInterface {
    return this.controllerAdapter;
  }

  private async saveCanonical(canonicalMap: CanonicalMidiMap, outputDir: string): Promise<void> {
    const yaml = await import('yaml');
    const { writeFileSync, mkdirSync } = await import('fs');
    const { join } = await import('path');

    mkdirSync(outputDir, { recursive: true });
    const filename = `${canonicalMap.device.model.toLowerCase().replace(/\s+/g, '-')}-${canonicalMap.metadata.name.toLowerCase().replace(/\s+/g, '-')}.yaml`;
    const filepath = join(outputDir, filename);

    writeFileSync(filepath, yaml.stringify(canonicalMap));
    this.emit('canonical-saved', { path: filepath });
  }

  private static async detectController(): Promise<ControllerAdapterInterface> {
    // Try to detect connected controller
    // Start with LCXL3, add more controllers later
    try {
      const { LaunchControlXL3Adapter } = await import('../adapters/controllers/LaunchControlXL3Adapter.js');
      return await LaunchControlXL3Adapter.create();
    } catch {
      throw new Error('No supported controller detected');
    }
  }

  private static getConverterFor(adapter: ControllerAdapterInterface): CanonicalConverterInterface {
    // Registry of converters by controller model
    if (adapter.model === 'Launch Control XL 3') {
      const { LaunchControlXL3Converter } = require('../converters/LaunchControlXL3Converter.js');
      return new LaunchControlXL3Converter();
    }
    throw new Error(`No converter available for ${adapter.model}`);
  }
}
\```

**Acceptance Criteria - Phase 4:**
- ‚úÖ Works with any ControllerAdapterInterface
- ‚úÖ Auto-detects connected controller
- ‚úÖ Supports multiple DAW targets simultaneously
- ‚úÖ Event-based progress reporting
- ‚úÖ Comprehensive error handling

program.parse();

## Phase 6: DAW Deployers

### Ardour Deployer

**Location:** `modules/controller-workflow/src/adapters/daws/ArdourDeployer.ts`

\```typescript
import { MidiMapBuilder, ArdourXMLSerializer } from '@oletizi/ardour-midi-maps';

export class ArdourDeployer implements DAWDeployerInterface {
  readonly dawName = 'Ardour';
  readonly version = '8.0';

  async deploy(canonicalMap: CanonicalMidiMap, options: DeploymentOptions): Promise<DeploymentResult> {
    try {
      // Convert canonical ‚Üí Ardour XML
      const ardourMap = this.convertToArdour(canonicalMap);
      const serializer = new ArdourXMLSerializer();
      const xml = serializer.serializeMidiMap(ardourMap);

      // Determine output path
      const outputPath = options.outputPath || await this.getDefaultOutputPath(canonicalMap);

      if (!options.dryRun) {
        const { writeFileSync, mkdirSync } = await import('fs');
        const { dirname } = await import('path');

        mkdirSync(dirname(outputPath), { recursive: true });
        writeFileSync(outputPath, xml);

        // Install to Ardour config if requested
        if (options.autoInstall) {
          const configDir = await this.getConfigDirectory();
          const { basename, join } = await import('path');
          const installPath = join(configDir, basename(outputPath));
          writeFileSync(installPath, xml);
          return {
            success: true,
            dawName: this.dawName,
            outputPath: installPath,
            installed: true
          };
        }
      }

      return {
        success: true,
        dawName: this.dawName,
        outputPath,
        installed: false
      };

    } catch (error) {
      return {
        success: false,
        dawName: this.dawName,
        errors: [error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error)]
      };
    }
  }

  async isInstalled(): Promise<boolean> {
    const { existsSync } = await import('fs');
    try {
      const configDir = await this.getConfigDirectory();
      return existsSync(configDir);
    } catch {
      return false;
    }
  }

  async getConfigDirectory(): Promise<string> {
    const { homedir } = await import('os');
    const { join } = await import('path');
    const home = homedir();

    switch (process.platform) {
      case 'darwin':
        return join(home, 'Library', 'Preferences', 'Ardour8', 'midi_maps');
      case 'linux':
        return join(home, '.config', 'ardour8', 'midi_maps');
      case 'win32':
        return join(home, 'AppData', 'Local', 'Ardour8', 'midi_maps');
      default:
        throw new Error(`Unsupported platform: ${process.platform}`);
    }
  }

  private convertToArdour(canonicalMap: CanonicalMidiMap): any {
    // Use existing ardour-midi-maps conversion logic
    const builder = new MidiMapBuilder({
      name: `${canonicalMap.device.manufacturer} ${canonicalMap.device.model}`,
      version: canonicalMap.version
    });

    // Convert controls
    for (const control of canonicalMap.controls) {
      if (control.type === 'button') {
        builder.addNoteBinding({
          channel: control.channel as number,
          note: control.cc!,
          function: control.plugin_parameter ?
            `/route/plugin/parameter S1 1 ${control.plugin_parameter}` :
            'transport-stop'
        });
      } else {
        builder.addCCBinding({
          channel: control.channel as number,
          controller: control.cc!,
          function: control.plugin_parameter ?
            `/route/plugin/parameter S1 1 ${control.plugin_parameter}` :
            'track-set-gain[1]',
          encoder: control.type === 'encoder'
        });
      }
    }

    return builder.build();
  }

  private async getDefaultOutputPath(canonicalMap: CanonicalMidiMap): Promise<string> {
    const { join } = await import('path');
    const filename = `${canonicalMap.device.manufacturer.toLowerCase()}-${canonicalMap.device.model.toLowerCase().replace(/\s+/g, '-')}.map`;
    return join(process.cwd(), 'dist', 'ardour-maps', filename);
  }
}
\```

## Phase 8: AI Parameter Matching Service

**Objective:** Implement Claude AI-powered fuzzy matching to automatically map hardware control names to plugin parameter indices.

**Location:** `modules/controller-workflow/src/services/ParameterMatcher.ts`

### Components

1. **ParameterMatcherInterface** - Core matching interface
2. **ParameterMatcher** - Implementation with Claude integration
3. **Plugin descriptor loader** - Load parameter databases
4. **Claude integration** - Dual method (API + CLI fallback)
5. **Confidence scoring** - Match quality metrics

### Implementation Requirements

- Load plugin descriptors from canonical-midi-maps registry
- Dual Claude integration: Anthropic API (primary), CLI (fallback)
- Semantic matching: exact, abbreviation, synonym recognition
- Confidence scoring: 0-1 scale with reasoning
- Error handling: graceful degradation if AI unavailable
- Caching: Save matches in canonical YAML for reuse
- Timeout handling: 30s default, configurable

## Future Controller Support (Extensibility)

### Adding a New Controller

**Required Steps:**

1. **Create Controller Adapter**
   \```typescript
   // src/adapters/controllers/NewControllerAdapter.ts
   export class NewControllerAdapter implements ControllerAdapterInterface {
     // Implement all interface methods
   }
   \```

2. **Create Converter**
   \```typescript
   // src/converters/NewControllerConverter.ts
   export class NewControllerConverter implements CanonicalConverterInterface {
     // Implement conversion logic
   }
   \```

3. **Register in Workflow**
   \```typescript
   // Update DeploymentWorkflow.detectController()
   // Update DeploymentWorkflow.getConverterFor()
   \```

**Potential Future Controllers:**
- Behringer X-Touch / X32
- Novation Launchpad
- Akai APC series
- Native Instruments Maschine
- Any controller with SysEx configuration

   233‚Üíimport { LaunchControlXL3 } from '@oletizi/launch-control-xl3';
   234‚Üíimport type { ControllerAdapterInterface } from '../../core/ControllerAdapter.js';
   235‚Üí
   236‚Üíexport class LaunchControlXL3Adapter implements ControllerAdapterInterface {
   237‚Üí  readonly manufacturer = 'Novation';
   238‚Üí  readonly model = 'Launch Control XL 3';
   239‚Üí  readonly capabilities = {
   240‚Üí    supportsCustomModes: true,
   241‚Üí    maxConfigSlots: 16,
   242‚Üí    supportsRead: true,
   243‚Üí    supportsWrite: true,
   244‚Üí    supportedControlTypes: ['encoder', 'slider', 'button'] as ControlType[]
   245‚Üí  };
   246‚Üí
   247‚Üí  constructor(private device: LaunchControlXL3) {}
   248‚Üí
   249‚Üí  static async create(): Promise<LaunchControlXL3Adapter> {
   250‚Üí    const device = new LaunchControlXL3({ enableCustomModes: true });
   251‚Üí    await device.connect();
   252‚Üí    return new LaunchControlXL3Adapter(device);
   253‚Üí  }
   254‚Üí
   255‚Üí  async connect(): Promise<void> {
   256‚Üí    await this.device.connect();
   257‚Üí  }
   258‚Üí
   259‚Üí  async disconnect(): Promise<void> {
   260‚Üí    await this.device.disconnect();
   261‚Üí  }
   262‚Üí
   263‚Üí  isConnected(): boolean {
   264‚Üí    return this.device.isConnected();
   265‚Üí  }
   266‚Üí
   267‚Üí  async listConfigurations(): Promise<ConfigurationSlot[]> {
   268‚Üí    const slots: ConfigurationSlot[] = [];
   269‚Üí    for (let i = 0; i < 16; i++) {
   270‚Üí      const mode = await this.device.readCustomMode(i);
   271‚Üí      slots.push({
   272‚Üí        index: i,
   273‚Üí        name: mode?.name,
   274‚Üí        isEmpty: mode === null
   275‚Üí      });
   276‚Üí    }
   277‚Üí    return slots;
   278‚Üí  }
   279‚Üí
   280‚Üí  async readConfiguration(slot: number): Promise<ControllerConfiguration> {
   281‚Üí    const customMode = await this.device.readCustomMode(slot);
   282‚Üí    if (!customMode) {
   283‚Üí      throw new Error(`No configuration in slot ${slot}`);
   284‚Üí    }
   285‚Üí
   286‚Üí    // Convert LCXL3 CustomMode ‚Üí generic ControllerConfiguration
   287‚Üí    return {
   288‚Üí      name: customMode.name,
   289‚Üí      controls: this.convertControls(customMode.controls),
   290‚Üí      metadata: customMode.metadata
   291‚Üí    };
   292‚Üí  }
   293‚Üí
   294‚Üí  async writeConfiguration(slot: number, config: ControllerConfiguration): Promise<void> {
   295‚Üí    // Convert generic ControllerConfiguration ‚Üí LCXL3 CustomMode
   296‚Üí    const customMode = this.convertToCustomMode(config);
   297‚Üí    await this.device.writeCustomMode(slot, customMode);
   298‚Üí  }
   299‚Üí
   300‚Üí  async getDeviceInfo(): Promise<DeviceInfo> {
   301‚Üí    const info = await this.device.verifyDevice();
   302‚Üí    return {
   303‚Üí      manufacturer: 'Novation',
   304‚Üí      model: 'Launch Control XL 3',
   305‚Üí      firmwareVersion: info.firmwareVersion
   306‚Üí    };
   307‚Üí  }
   308‚Üí
   309‚Üí  private convertControls(controls: any): ControlMapping[] {
   310‚Üí    const mappings: ControlMapping[] = [];
   311‚Üí    for (const [key, control] of Object.entries(controls)) {
   312‚Üí      mappings.push({
   313‚Üí        id: key,
   314‚Üí        name: (control as any).name,
   315‚Üí        type: (control as any).type,
   316‚Üí        cc: (control as any).ccNumber,
   317‚Üí        channel: (control as any).midiChannel,
   318‚Üí        range: [(control as any).minValue, (control as any).maxValue]
   319‚Üí      });
   320‚Üí    }
   321‚Üí    return mappings;
   322‚Üí  }

   334‚Üí- ‚úÖ Provides generic ControllerConfiguration format

   339‚Üí
   340‚Üí## Phase 3: Launch Control XL3 Converter
   341‚Üí
   342‚Üí**Location:** `modules/controller-workflow/src/converters/LaunchControlXL3Converter.ts`
   343‚Üí
   344‚Üí\```typescript
   345‚Üíexport class LaunchControlXL3Converter implements CanonicalConverterInterface {
   346‚Üí
   347‚Üí  getConverterInfo(): ConverterInfo {
   348‚Üí    return {
   349‚Üí      supportedController: 'Novation Launch Control XL 3',
   350‚Üí      version: '1.0.0',
   351‚Üí      features: ['custom-modes', 'label-preservation', 'all-control-types']
   352‚Üí    };
   353‚Üí  }
   354‚Üí
   355‚Üí  canConvert(config: ControllerConfiguration): boolean {
   356‚Üí    // Validate config has required LCXL3 structure
   357‚Üí    return config.controls.length > 0 &&
   358‚Üí           config.controls.every(c => c.cc !== undefined);
   359‚Üí  }
   360‚Üí
   361‚Üí  convert(
   362‚Üí    config: ControllerConfiguration,
   363‚Üí    options: ConversionOptions
   364‚Üí  ): CanonicalMidiMap {
   365‚Üí    return {
   366‚Üí      version: '1.0.0',
   367‚Üí      device: {
   368‚Üí        manufacturer: 'Novation',
   369‚Üí        model: 'Launch Control XL 3',
   370‚Üí        ...(options.deviceOverrides || {})
   371‚Üí      },
   372‚Üí      metadata: {
   373‚Üí        name: config.name,
   374‚Üí        description: `Converted from LCXL3 custom mode: ${config.name}`,
   375‚Üí        date: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0],
   376‚Üí        tags: ['launch-control-xl3', 'auto-generated']
   377‚Üí      },
   378‚Üí      plugin: options.pluginInfo,
   379‚Üí      midi_channel: options.midiChannel,
   380‚Üí      controls: this.mapControls(config.controls, options)
   381‚Üí    };
   382‚Üí  }
   383‚Üí
   384‚Üí  private mapControls(controls: ControlMapping[], options: ConversionOptions): ControlDefinition[] {
   385‚Üí    return controls.map(control => ({
   386‚Üí      id: this.mapControlId(control.id),        // SEND_A1 ‚Üí encoder_1
   387‚Üí      name: options.preserveLabels ? control.name : this.getDefaultName(control.id),
   388‚Üí      type: this.mapControlType(control.type),
   389‚Üí      cc: control.cc!,
   390‚Üí      channel: control.channel ?? options.midiChannel ?? 0,
   391‚Üí      range: control.range || [0, 127],
   392‚Üí      description: `Mapped from ${control.id}`
   393‚Üí    }));
   394‚Üí  }
   395‚Üí
   396‚Üí  private mapControlId(lcxl3Id: string): string {
   397‚Üí    // LCXL3-specific mapping: SEND_A1 ‚Üí encoder_1, FADER1 ‚Üí slider_1, etc.
   398‚Üí    const mapping: Record<string, string> = {
   399‚Üí      'SEND_A1': 'encoder_1', 'SEND_A2': 'encoder_2', 'SEND_A3': 'encoder_3',
   400‚Üí      'SEND_A4': 'encoder_4', 'SEND_A5': 'encoder_5', 'SEND_A6': 'encoder_6',
   401‚Üí      'SEND_A7': 'encoder_7', 'SEND_A8': 'encoder_8',
   402‚Üí      'SEND_B1': 'encoder_9', 'SEND_B2': 'encoder_10', 'SEND_B3': 'encoder_11',
   403‚Üí      'SEND_B4': 'encoder_12', 'SEND_B5': 'encoder_13', 'SEND_B6': 'encoder_14',
   404‚Üí      'SEND_B7': 'encoder_15', 'SEND_B8': 'encoder_16',
   405‚Üí      'PAN1': 'encoder_17', 'PAN2': 'encoder_18', 'PAN3': 'encoder_19',
   406‚Üí      'PAN4': 'encoder_20', 'PAN5': 'encoder_21', 'PAN6': 'encoder_22',
   407‚Üí      'PAN7': 'encoder_23', 'PAN8': 'encoder_24',
   408‚Üí      'FADER1': 'slider_1', 'FADER2': 'slider_2', 'FADER3': 'slider_3',
   409‚Üí      'FADER4': 'slider_4', 'FADER5': 'slider_5', 'FADER6': 'slider_6',
   410‚Üí      'FADER7': 'slider_7', 'FADER8': 'slider_8',
   411‚Üí      'FOCUS1': 'button_1', 'FOCUS2': 'button_2', 'FOCUS3': 'button_3',
   412‚Üí      'FOCUS4': 'button_4', 'FOCUS5': 'button_5', 'FOCUS6': 'button_6',
   413‚Üí      'FOCUS7': 'button_7', 'FOCUS8': 'button_8',
   414‚Üí      'CONTROL1': 'button_9', 'CONTROL2': 'button_10', 'CONTROL3': 'button_11',
   415‚Üí      'CONTROL4': 'button_12', 'CONTROL5': 'button_13', 'CONTROL6': 'button_14',
   416‚Üí      'CONTROL7': 'button_15', 'CONTROL8': 'button_16'
   417‚Üí    };
   418‚Üí    return mapping[lcxl3Id] || lcxl3Id.toLowerCase();
   419‚Üí  }
   420‚Üí
   421‚Üí  private mapControlType(type: ControlType): 'encoder' | 'slider' | 'button' | 'button_group' {
   422‚Üí    return type;
   423‚Üí  }
   424‚Üí
   425‚Üí  private getDefaultName(controlId: string): string {
   426‚Üí    return controlId.replace(/_/g, ' ').replace(/\b\w/g, l => l.toUpperCase());
   427‚Üí  }
   428‚Üí}
   429‚Üí\```

   439‚Üí
   440‚Üí## Phase 4: Generalized Deployment Workflow
   441‚Üí
   442‚Üí**Location:** `modules/controller-workflow/src/orchestrator/DeploymentWorkflow.ts`
   443‚Üí
   444‚Üí\```typescript
   445‚Üíimport { EventEmitter } from 'eventemitter3';
   446‚Üí
   447‚Üíexport interface WorkflowOptions {
   448‚Üí  configSlot: number;
   449‚Üí  targets: string[];
   450‚Üí  pluginInfo?: PluginDefinition;
   451‚Üí  midiChannel?: number;
   452‚Üí  preserveLabels?: boolean;
   453‚Üí  outputDir?: string;
   454‚Üí  autoInstall?: boolean;
   455‚Üí  dryRun?: boolean;
   456‚Üí}
   457‚Üí
   458‚Üíexport interface WorkflowResult {
   459‚Üí  success: boolean;
   460‚Üí  controllerConfig?: ControllerConfiguration;
   461‚Üí  canonicalMap?: CanonicalMidiMap;
   462‚Üí  deployments: DeploymentResult[];
   463‚Üí  errors: string[];
   464‚Üí}
   465‚Üí
   466‚Üíexport interface CreateOptions {
   467‚Üí  controllerAdapter?: ControllerAdapterInterface;
   468‚Üí  targets: string[];
   469‚Üí}
   470‚Üí
   471‚Üíexport class DeploymentWorkflow extends EventEmitter {
   472‚Üí  constructor(
   473‚Üí    private controllerAdapter: ControllerAdapterInterface,
   474‚Üí    private converter: CanonicalConverterInterface,
   475‚Üí    private deployers: Map<string, DAWDeployerInterface>
   476‚Üí  ) {
   477‚Üí    super();
   478‚Üí  }
   479‚Üí
   480‚Üí  static async create(options: CreateOptions): Promise<DeploymentWorkflow> {
   481‚Üí    // Auto-detect controller or use specified adapter
   482‚Üí    const adapter = options.controllerAdapter || await this.detectController();
   483‚Üí
   484‚Üí    // Get appropriate converter for detected controller
   485‚Üí    const converter = this.getConverterFor(adapter);
   486‚Üí
   487‚Üí    // Initialize DAW deployers
   488‚Üí    const deployers = new Map<string, DAWDeployerInterface>();
   489‚Üí    if (options.targets.includes('ardour')) {
   490‚Üí      const { ArdourDeployer } = await import('../adapters/daws/ArdourDeployer.js');
   491‚Üí      deployers.set('ardour', new ArdourDeployer());
   492‚Üí    }
   493‚Üí    if (options.targets.includes('live')) {
   494‚Üí      const { LiveDeployer } = await import('../adapters/daws/LiveDeployer.js');
   495‚Üí      deployers.set('live', new LiveDeployer());
   496‚Üí    }
   497‚Üí
   498‚Üí    return new DeploymentWorkflow(adapter, converter, deployers);
   499‚Üí  }
   500‚Üí
   501‚Üí  async execute(options: WorkflowOptions): Promise<WorkflowResult> {
   502‚Üí    const errors: string[] = [];
   503‚Üí
   504‚Üí    try {
   505‚Üí      // Step 1: Read configuration from controller
   506‚Üí      this.emit('progress', { step: 1, message: 'Reading controller configuration...' });
   507‚Üí      const config = await this.controllerAdapter.readConfiguration(options.configSlot);
   508‚Üí
   509‚Üí      // Step 2: Convert to canonical format
   510‚Üí      this.emit('progress', { step: 2, message: 'Converting to canonical format...' });
   511‚Üí      const canonicalMap = this.converter.convert(config, {
   512‚Üí        pluginInfo: options.pluginInfo,
   513‚Üí        midiChannel: options.midiChannel,
   514‚Üí        preserveLabels: options.preserveLabels ?? true
   515‚Üí      });
   516‚Üí
   517‚Üí      // Step 3: Save canonical YAML (optional)
   518‚Üí      if (options.outputDir) {
   519‚Üí        await this.saveCanonical(canonicalMap, options.outputDir);
   520‚Üí      }
   521‚Üí
   522‚Üí      // Step 4: Deploy to each target DAW
   523‚Üí      this.emit('progress', { step: 3, message: 'Deploying to DAWs...' });
   524‚Üí      const deployments: DeploymentResult[] = [];
   525‚Üí
   526‚Üí      for (const target of options.targets) {
   527‚Üí        const deployer = this.deployers.get(target);
   528‚Üí        if (deployer) {
   529‚Üí          const result = await deployer.deploy(canonicalMap, {
   530‚Üí            autoInstall: options.autoInstall,
   531‚Üí            dryRun: options.dryRun
   532‚Üí          });
   533‚Üí          deployments.push(result);
   534‚Üí          if (!result.success) {
   535‚Üí            errors.push(...(result.errors || [`${target} deployment failed`]));
   536‚Üí          }
   537‚Üí        } else {
   538‚Üí          errors.push(`No deployer available for ${target}`);
   539‚Üí        }
   540‚Üí      }
   541‚Üí
   542‚Üí      return {
   543‚Üí        success: deployments.every(d => d.success) && errors.length === 0,
   544‚Üí        controllerConfig: config,
   545‚Üí        canonicalMap,
   546‚Üí        deployments,
   547‚Üí        errors
   548‚Üí      };
   549‚Üí
   550‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   551‚Üí      errors.push(error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error));
   552‚Üí      return {
   553‚Üí        success: false,
   554‚Üí        deployments: [],
   555‚Üí        errors
   556‚Üí      };
   557‚Üí    }
   558‚Üí  }
   559‚Üí
   560‚Üí  getControllerAdapter(): ControllerAdapterInterface {
   561‚Üí    return this.controllerAdapter;
   562‚Üí  }
   563‚Üí
   564‚Üí  private async saveCanonical(canonicalMap: CanonicalMidiMap, outputDir: string): Promise<void> {
   565‚Üí    const yaml = await import('yaml');
   566‚Üí    const { writeFileSync, mkdirSync } = await import('fs');
   567‚Üí    const { join } = await import('path');
   568‚Üí
   569‚Üí    mkdirSync(outputDir, { recursive: true });
   570‚Üí    const filename = `${canonicalMap.device.model.toLowerCase().replace(/\s+/g, '-')}-${canonicalMap.metadata.name.toLowerCase().replace(/\s+/g, '-')}.yaml`;
   571‚Üí    const filepath = join(outputDir, filename);
   572‚Üí
   573‚Üí    writeFileSync(filepath, yaml.stringify(canonicalMap));
   574‚Üí    this.emit('canonical-saved', { path: filepath });
   575‚Üí  }
   576‚Üí
   577‚Üí  private static async detectController(): Promise<ControllerAdapterInterface> {
   578‚Üí    // Try to detect connected controller
   579‚Üí    // Start with LCXL3, add more controllers later
   580‚Üí    try {
   581‚Üí      const { LaunchControlXL3Adapter } = await import('../adapters/controllers/LaunchControlXL3Adapter.js');
   582‚Üí      return await LaunchControlXL3Adapter.create();
   583‚Üí    } catch {
   584‚Üí      throw new Error('No supported controller detected');
   585‚Üí    }
   586‚Üí  }
   587‚Üí
   588‚Üí  private static getConverterFor(adapter: ControllerAdapterInterface): CanonicalConverterInterface {
   589‚Üí    // Registry of converters by controller model
   590‚Üí    if (adapter.model === 'Launch Control XL 3') {
   591‚Üí      const { LaunchControlXL3Converter } = require('../converters/LaunchControlXL3Converter.js');
   592‚Üí      return new LaunchControlXL3Converter();
   593‚Üí    }
   594‚Üí    throw new Error(`No converter available for ${adapter.model}`);
   595‚Üí  }
   596‚Üí}
   597‚Üí\```
   598‚Üí
   599‚Üí**Acceptance Criteria - Phase 4:**
   600‚Üí- ‚úÖ Works with any ControllerAdapterInterface
   601‚Üí- ‚úÖ Auto-detects connected controller
   602‚Üí- ‚úÖ Supports multiple DAW targets simultaneously
   603‚Üí- ‚úÖ Event-based progress reporting
   604‚Üí- ‚úÖ Comprehensive error handling
   605‚Üí

   728‚Üí## Phase 6: DAW Deployers
   729‚Üí
   730‚Üí### Ardour Deployer
   731‚Üí
   732‚Üí**Location:** `modules/controller-workflow/src/adapters/daws/ArdourDeployer.ts`
   733‚Üí
   734‚Üí\```typescript
   735‚Üíimport { MidiMapBuilder, ArdourXMLSerializer } from '@oletizi/ardour-midi-maps';
   736‚Üí
   737‚Üíexport class ArdourDeployer implements DAWDeployerInterface {
   738‚Üí  readonly dawName = 'Ardour';
   739‚Üí  readonly version = '8.0';
   740‚Üí
   741‚Üí  async deploy(canonicalMap: CanonicalMidiMap, options: DeploymentOptions): Promise<DeploymentResult> {
   742‚Üí    try {
   743‚Üí      // Convert canonical ‚Üí Ardour XML
   744‚Üí      const ardourMap = this.convertToArdour(canonicalMap);
   745‚Üí      const serializer = new ArdourXMLSerializer();
   746‚Üí      const xml = serializer.serializeMidiMap(ardourMap);
   747‚Üí
   748‚Üí      // Determine output path
   749‚Üí      const outputPath = options.outputPath || await this.getDefaultOutputPath(canonicalMap);
   750‚Üí
   751‚Üí      if (!options.dryRun) {
   752‚Üí        const { writeFileSync, mkdirSync } = await import('fs');
   753‚Üí        const { dirname } = await import('path');
   754‚Üí
   755‚Üí        mkdirSync(dirname(outputPath), { recursive: true });
   756‚Üí        writeFileSync(outputPath, xml);
   757‚Üí
   758‚Üí        // Install to Ardour config if requested
   759‚Üí        if (options.autoInstall) {
   760‚Üí          const configDir = await this.getConfigDirectory();
   761‚Üí          const { basename, join } = await import('path');
   762‚Üí          const installPath = join(configDir, basename(outputPath));
   763‚Üí          writeFileSync(installPath, xml);
   764‚Üí          return {
   765‚Üí            success: true,
   766‚Üí            dawName: this.dawName,
   767‚Üí            outputPath: installPath,
   768‚Üí            installed: true
   769‚Üí          };
   770‚Üí        }
   771‚Üí      }
   772‚Üí
   773‚Üí      return {
   774‚Üí        success: true,
   775‚Üí        dawName: this.dawName,
   776‚Üí        outputPath,
   777‚Üí        installed: false
   778‚Üí      };
   779‚Üí
   780‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   781‚Üí      return {
   782‚Üí        success: false,
   783‚Üí        dawName: this.dawName,
   784‚Üí        errors: [error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error)]
   785‚Üí      };
   786‚Üí    }
   787‚Üí  }
   788‚Üí
   789‚Üí  async isInstalled(): Promise<boolean> {
   790‚Üí    const { existsSync } = await import('fs');
   791‚Üí    try {
   792‚Üí      const configDir = await this.getConfigDirectory();
   793‚Üí      return existsSync(configDir);
   794‚Üí    } catch {
   795‚Üí      return false;
   796‚Üí    }
   797‚Üí  }
   798‚Üí
   799‚Üí  async getConfigDirectory(): Promise<string> {
   800‚Üí    const { homedir } = await import('os');
   801‚Üí    const { join } = await import('path');
   802‚Üí    const home = homedir();
   803‚Üí
   804‚Üí    switch (process.platform) {
   805‚Üí      case 'darwin':
   806‚Üí        return join(home, 'Library', 'Preferences', 'Ardour8', 'midi_maps');
   807‚Üí      case 'linux':
   808‚Üí        return join(home, '.config', 'ardour8', 'midi_maps');
   809‚Üí      case 'win32':
   810‚Üí        return join(home, 'AppData', 'Local', 'Ardour8', 'midi_maps');
   811‚Üí      default:
   812‚Üí        throw new Error(`Unsupported platform: ${process.platform}`);
   813‚Üí    }
   814‚Üí  }
   815‚Üí
   816‚Üí  private convertToArdour(canonicalMap: CanonicalMidiMap): any {
   817‚Üí    // Use existing ardour-midi-maps conversion logic
   818‚Üí    const builder = new MidiMapBuilder({
   819‚Üí      name: `${canonicalMap.device.manufacturer} ${canonicalMap.device.model}`,
   820‚Üí      version: canonicalMap.version
   821‚Üí    });
   822‚Üí
   823‚Üí    // Convert controls
   824‚Üí    for (const control of canonicalMap.controls) {
   825‚Üí      if (control.type === 'button') {
   826‚Üí        builder.addNoteBinding({
   827‚Üí          channel: control.channel as number,
   828‚Üí          note: control.cc!,
   829‚Üí          function: control.plugin_parameter ?
   830‚Üí            `/route/plugin/parameter S1 1 ${control.plugin_parameter}` :
   831‚Üí            'transport-stop'
   832‚Üí        });
   833‚Üí      } else {
   834‚Üí        builder.addCCBinding({
   835‚Üí          channel: control.channel as number,
   836‚Üí          controller: control.cc!,
   837‚Üí          function: control.plugin_parameter ?
   838‚Üí            `/route/plugin/parameter S1 1 ${control.plugin_parameter}` :
   839‚Üí            'track-set-gain[1]',
   840‚Üí          encoder: control.type === 'encoder'
   841‚Üí        });
   842‚Üí      }
   843‚Üí    }
   844‚Üí
   845‚Üí    return builder.build();
   846‚Üí  }
   847‚Üí
   848‚Üí  private async getDefaultOutputPath(canonicalMap: CanonicalMidiMap): Promise<string> {
   849‚Üí    const { join } = await import('path');
   850‚Üí    const filename = `${canonicalMap.device.manufacturer.toLowerCase()}-${canonicalMap.device.model.toLowerCase().replace(/\s+/g, '-')}.map`;
   851‚Üí    return join(process.cwd(), 'dist', 'ardour-maps', filename);
   852‚Üí  }
   853‚Üí}
   854‚Üí\```
